member.name: DXGI_ADAPTER_FLAG
member.summary: Identifies the type of DXGI adapter.

member.name: DXGI_ADAPTER_FLAG.DXGI_ADAPTER_FLAG_REMOTE
member.summary: Value always set to 0. This flag is reserved.

summary.para: Specifies a software adapter. For more info about this flag, see new info in Windows 8 about enumerating adapters.
Direct3D 11: This enumeration value is supported starting with Windows 8.

member.name: DXGI_ADAPTER_FLAG.DXGI_ADAPTER_FLAG_FORCE_DWORD
member.summary: Forces this enumeration to compile to 32 bits in size. Without this value, some compilers would allow this enumeration to compile to a size other than 32 bits. This value is not used.
